query:
UPDATE island_guides SET 
overview = 'Maafushi is a vibrant local island in Kaafu Atoll, offering an authentic Maldivian experience without luxury resort prices. Known for excellent diving and snorkeling, budget-friendly guesthouses, and lively atmosphere, it is perfect for backpackers and water sports enthusiasts.',
topThingsToDo = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Snorkeling Tours', 'description', 'Half-day snorkeling trips to nearby reefs with equipment and photos. $15-25 per person.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Scuba Diving', 'description', 'Single dives ($40), Discover Scuba ($75), 2-day certification courses ($315).'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Dolphin Watching', 'description', 'Evening boat tours to spot dolphins in their natural habitat.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Fishing Trips', 'description', 'Morning fishing ($80) or sunset fishing with BBQ dinner ($25).'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Resort Day Tours', 'description', 'Visit luxury resort islands and explore overwater bungalows. $70-100.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Water Sports', 'description', 'Jetskiing, windsurfing, parasailing, kayaking, and paddleboarding available.')
),
attractions = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Bikini Beach', 'description', 'Main beach with chairs and water sports facilities. Clear turquoise waters.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Biyadhoo Reef', 'description', 'Popular snorkeling destination with colorful coral gardens and tropical fish.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Turtle Reef', 'description', 'Excellent spot for turtle watching and snorkeling with pristine coral.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Local Island Shops', 'description', 'Colorful shops and cafes selling souvenirs and handicrafts.')
),
foodCafes = JSON_ARRAY(
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Local Restaurants', 'description', 'Affordable eateries serving traditional Maldivian cuisine. $5-15.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Beachfront Cafes', 'description', 'Casual cafes with sea views, serving coffee and light meals. $3-10.'),
  JSON_OBJECT('name', 'Hotel Restaurants', 'description', 'Guesthouses offer dining options from budget to mid-range. $10-25.')
),
quickFacts = JSON_ARRAY(
  'Budget-friendly local island alternative to luxury resorts',
  'Excellent diving and snorkeling with diverse marine life',
  'Home to vibrant backpacker community and lively nightlife',
  'Easily accessible from Male by ferry (45 min, $3-5) or speedboat (30 min, $18-25)',
  'Modest dress code required on the island',
  'Multiple guesthouses and budget hotels available',
  'Water sports and fishing are popular activities',
  'Best time to visit: November to April (dry season)'
),
flightInfo = 'Fly into Velana International Airport (MLE) in Male, then take a ferry or speedboat to Maafushi.',
speedboatInfo = 'Speedboat from Male takes approximately 30 minutes and costs $18-25 per person. Multiple daily departures available.',
ferryInfo = 'Public ferry from Male takes approximately 45 minutes and costs $3-5 per person. Budget-friendly option with multiple daily schedules.',
bestTimeToVisit = 'November to April (dry season) offers the best weather and visibility for diving and snorkeling.',
currency = 'Maldivian Rufiyaa (MVR) / USD',
language = 'Dhivehi (Maldivian), English widely spoken'
WHERE id = 2;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute UPDATE island_guides SET

flightInfo = 'Fly into Velana International Airport (MLE) in Male, then take a ferry or speedboat to Maafushi.',
speedboatInfo = 'Speedboat from Male takes approximately 30 minutes and costs $18-25 per person. Multiple daily departures available.',
ferryInfo = 'Public ferry from Male takes approximately 45 minutes and costs $3-5 per person. Budget-friendly option with multiple daily schedules.',
bestTimeToVisit = 'November to April (dry season) offers the best weather and visibility for diving and snorkeling.',
